name: OS-Ticket Red
additional_info: You can find the version number in the bottom right corner of the admin panel. Works best in Chrome and Opera, like everything in the world. The latest released version is 1.0. PLEASE READ: Because userstyles doesn't like importing fonts, one you install or update this userstyle, you can uncomment the import tags for font change. CONFIGURATION: Change the url-prefix to whatever site you want in the source.
